Text: Dammit, i just bought hardback 3 days ago.  Thought I'd have to wait until april to get this.
I bought the hard-back before I downloaded it myself. Then I started correcting it. I forgot about the epilogue though, so there's that. :D But the errors were minimal when I went back and did them.

Very good upload:) 

I read the .mobi with Kindle for PC. Yes there are still minor errors (I've read retail Kindle books with more), but nothing that detracted from a very enjoyable read.

Would've bought the eBook if it were available - very poor decision by the powers that be.

Many thanks to Micron66 and Malice181 for all the work it took to make this torrent!

Since some people seem to notice the small errors that are to be found, why doesn't you all come together next time and prrofread a chapter each? :)

Well done Malice. To put the effort of getting this book out in e-format. I salute you!
lol. Start with proofreading my comments :P
